attributes.action: To give a higher wage to doctors and  less to footballers
attributes.background: Doctors save lives and footballers just play games and it costs a lot of money to build the stadiums and that money could be used to make new or more medicine.

rejection.details:
The Government does control how much doctors get paid, but it doesn't decide how much footballers are paid.

If you would like doctors' pay to be increased, you could start a petition asking for this.
